short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View your Google Calendar events with the click of a button

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With Quick View, you can see all your upcoming events, join video conferences, and see a countdown to your next event without even opening Google Calendar!
